name: Arthief
description:
A thief is asked to steal a painting from the Art Museum. Will he be able to sneak past the surveillance of the guard?

Gameplay Developers

This game was realized by Matteo Garbi, Paolo Ricci and Mirko Satragno as a project for the "Virtual Reality" course at "Politecnico di Torino".

How to Play

Move around the Art Museum and search for the right painting. Once you find it, run to the exit before the timer expires. The faster the theft, the higher the score!

Avoid the cameras and hide behind the objects in the room to avoid being seen by the guard and the cameras.
